mapper.sql: id, out_gate_id, terminal_id, calculate_day, amount, avg_temperature, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE refri_house_avg_temp
out_gate_id = #{outGateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
calculate_day = #{calculateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
avg_temperature = #{avgTemperature,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
